extendedInfo.description: " If you would like to share a fun design app with your child, be sure to check out Coco Paint My Dress!" By The iPhone Mom.How would you like to paint your own unique dresses? Paint all kinds of dresses, tops, skirts, pants, socks, shoes, and other accessories for four cute characters - Coco, Sophia, Peter and their feline friend, Kitty. Make your creations for them and they will tell you how much they like it with their fun voices. Add other decorations to your creations once you've finishing painting or coloring for that special touch.All dressed up? Time to take a snapshot! Whatâs more, you can even put on your own favorite clothes and take a picture together with them. Cool! Share photos with family and friends via email or Facebook. One last thing: remember to send the photo into our weekly contest, âMy Dress Showâ. Letâs see who will win the chance to be in the big show for tens of thousands of kids around the world. Wow! ^.^We keep updating the APP to add more fun stuff for kids. Features:â 4 fun characters to choose fromâ 140+ items for dressing upâ Create your own dress designs by painting (older kids) or coloring (younger kids)â Fun voices tell you how characters feel about dresses or accessoriesâ Take a snapshot of your creations. You can even put on your favorite clothes and take a snapshot with the characters!â Send & share your designs with family and friends by email or Facebookâ Send creations to us for the weekly contest, âMy Dress Showââ Keep updatingThe four characters:Coco, the cute brown-haired girl, enjoys the sunshine on the beach.Sophia, the princess with golden hair, lives in the castle.Peter, the sports-loving boy, hangs out at the playground.Kitty, the fat cat in the garden, is the best friend of all the kids.Privacy Policy:Privacy is an issue that Cocoplay always takes seriously. We declare that Coco Paint My Dress does NOT collect ANY personal information of users. Contacts:Like us on Facebook to be a Coco fun: http://www.facebook.com/cocoplaySend us your ideas or questions: support@cocoplay.com
